Ironi Antoine Griezmann: Penyerang yang Lebih Sibuk Bertahan
04 Nov 2019, 16:50 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Tujuan Barcelona membeli Antoine Griezmann tentu saja untuk menambah kekuatan di lini depan. Namun, yang kini didapat adalah ironi. Sebab, pemain asal Prancis justru lebih sering terlibat dalam peran bertahan.
Antoine Griezmann menjadi pembelian paling mahal Barcelona pada awal musim 2019/2020. Barcelona harus membayar 120 juta euro untuk bisa membajak Griezmann dari Atletico Madrid.
Saat masih membela Atletico Madrid, Griezmann punya reputasi bagus sebagai mesin gol. Dia tidak pernah mencetak kurang dari 15 gol di La Liga setiap musim. Griezmann juga menjadi tumpuan timnas Prancis untuk mendulang gol.
Awalnya, Griezmann juga diharap bisa tampil tajam di Barcelona. Apalagi, dia mendapat sokongan dari Lionel Messi dan Luis Suarez. Namun, yang terjadi kini adalah Griezmann sulit padu dengan pemain lain di lini depan Barcelona.

The irony of Antoine Griezmann: A more busy attacker survives
Nov 04 2019, 16:50 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Barcelona's goal in buying Antoine Griezmann is of course to add strength to the front lines. However, what is now obtained is irony. Because, players from France are actually more often involved in defensive roles.
Antoine Griezmann became Barcelona's most expensive purchase at the start of the 2019/2020 season. Barcelona must pay 120 million euros to be able to hijack Griezmann from Atletico Madrid.
While still defending Atletico Madrid, Griezmann had a good reputation as a goal machine. He has never scored less than 15 goals in La Liga every season. Griezmann also became the foundation of the French national team to gain goals.
Initially, Griezmann was also expected to appear sharply in Barcelona. Moreover, he received support from Lionel Messi and Luis Suarez. However, what is happening now is that Griezmann is difficult to match with other players on the Barcelona front line.
